snippet: A survey of races for New York City mayor and comptroller indicated that scandals might not be weighing down two candidates.
abstract: Trailside blog; Quinnipiac University poll shows Anthony D Weiner and Christine C Quinn remain at the front of the pack among Democratic candidates for mayor, and Eliot Spitzer holds a comfortable lead in the Democratic primary for comptroller; poll suggests scandals might not be weighing down either Weiner or Spitzer.
lead_paragraph: A survey of races for New York City mayor and comptroller indicated that scandals might not be weighing down two candidates.

headline.main: Poll Finds Quinn, Weiner and Spitzer Are Out Front
headline.print_headline:
Weiner and Quinn
On Top in New Poll
